easySteps.title: 3 Easy steps
easySteps.text: to get an online electronics appraisal

contentStep1.stepText: Send us photos and key details about your device via your preferred messaging app.

contentStep2.stepText: If you like our offer, schedule a free evaluation with our expert.

contentStep3.stepText: Receive your payment instantly in a way that works best for you.

list.title: We purchase electronics in any condition
Specializing in challenging cases (devices requiring repair, water damage, factory defects, non-functional units, physical damage)
All processing and shipping costs covered
We guarantee fully legal and transparent transactions

feedback.content: Just unloaded my 65" Samsung QLED that was collecting dust after the upgrade. These guys in Miami made it painless - quoted me right over the phone, showed up on time, paid what they promised. Even helped disconnect it from the wall mount. Solid service, would definitely recommend!
feedback.name: Michael R.

feedback.content: Got rid of my old side-by-side Frigidaire yesterday. Was worried about moving that beast, but their team handled everything. Price was fair, though a bit less than I hoped for. Still, can't beat the convenience. Quick, professional - in and out in 20 minutes. Would've given 5 stars if the price was a bit higher.
feedback.name: Sarah M.

feedback.content: Had an EGO electric mower taking up space in my garage since moving to a condo. These folks were a lifesaver! Easy scheduling, showed up when they said they would, and paid in cash on the spot. Even took the charger and batteries. Whole process took maybe 15 minutes tops. Definitely the way to go if you need to sell electronics quickly!
feedback.name: David K.

listAsq.title: What kind of cars do you buy?
listAsq.content: Absolutely any: whole, after the accident, not customs clearance, on tp. Mark, year release, mileage, condition do not matter. Redemptionaem credit cars, as well as cars with penalties. We work with legal entities and individuals, Redemption of car fleets.

listAsq.title: Can I leave the car for you to sell?
listAsq.content: Yes. We will put your vehicle on consignment at our dealership.

listAsq.title: How long does the sale last?
listAsq.content: The sale of the car takes place in 2-3 hours.

listAsq.title: Do you buy only in Kiev?
listAsq.content: No, we redemption cars all over Ukraine. In most cases. Redemption in Ukraine occurs on the day of communication.

listAsq.title: I want to sell for as much as possible!
listAsq.content: To increase Redemption's price by 10%, wash the car, grab a a second set of tires and keys. In 90% of cases the valuation will be higher than other car Redemption.

listAsq.title: I'll sell the car for more!
listAsq.content: No problem! We just want to save you from wasting your time. Pre-sale preparation, photo shoots, registration on profile sites, pay for advertising. ads, answering phones and traveling to appointments at inconvenient times is the least of what you're gonna to deal with.
